item.title: OnePlus 13R launching in India on January 7: Price, design, specs and everything expected | Mint - Mint
item.description:
OnePlus 13R launching in India on January 7: Price, design, specs and everything expected

Publication Date: N/A Source: Live Mint

OnePlus is set to unveil its flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 13R, at an event on January 7, alongside the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus Watch 3. This device is projected to be a key competitor in the premium mid-range segment for 2025.

OnePlus 13R expected specifications:

  • 6.78-inch 8T LTPO AMOLED display with 4,500 nits peak brightness.
  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor with Adreno 750 GPU.
  • Support for up to 16GB of LPDDR5X RAM and 1TB of UFS 4.0 storage.
  • Triple camera setup with 50MP primary sensor, likely including a telephoto lens.
  • 16MP front camera.
  • IP65 rating for dust and splash resistance.
  • Expected to run OxygenOS 15 on Android 15.

In China, pricing starts at 3399 yuan for 12GB RAM/256GB storage model. Possible Indian price around ₹40,000 is still to be confirmed at the launch.

item.title: Is the MCX stock set for a rally? | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Is the MCX Stock Set for a Rally?

Publication Date: November 20, 2023 Source: Live Mint

With technology upgrades and the launch of a new platform in 2023, followed by the introduction of new products, the Multi Commodity Exchange of India Ltd. (MCX) solidifies its position as the leading commodity derivatives exchange in India.

  • Catering to over 90% of India’s commodity derivative trades.
  • Facilitates price discovery and provides price risk management tools.
  • Established in 2003 under SEBI’s regulatory framework.
“The introduction of new products will significantly impact MCX's operations.”

This development signals a promising future for MCX, especially with its expanding role in India’s commodity trading landscape.

item.title: Today's Quordle Answers and Hints for January 01, 2025 - Sportskeeda
item.description:
Today's Quordle Answers and Hints for January 01, 2025

Date: January 01, 2025

Source: Sportskeeda

Quordle Answers (January 01, 2025): Struggling to solve today's Quordle? No worries. We have today's Quordle hints and answers for you to solve it on your own!

If you're a fan of word puzzles, you probably already know that Quordle is a more challenging version of Wordle. Instead of guessing just one word, Quordle requires you to guess four five-letter words simultaneously within nine attempts.

Key Points:

  • Today's Quordle answers: CLING, SUITE, WORRY, TONIC.
  • Quordle Chill answers: SLATE, USAGE, COMIC, WHINE.
  • Quordle Extreme answers: BRUTE, PHONY, TIMID, TWIRL.
  • Quordle Sequence answers: STALK, CHAIN, ADULT, BOARD.
WARNING: Spoilers ahead! Only read on if you want to know today's Quordle answers.

And that's a wrap! That's all the Quordle answers for the day.

item.title: Chrome Browser Extension Hacked, Your Data And Passwords Could Be Exposed - News18
item.description:
Chrome Browser Extension Hacked: Exposing User Data and Passwords

Date: December 31, 2024

Source: News18

Chrome users are alarmed by a large-scale hacking incident affecting extensions, putting millions of users' data and security authenticity at risk. The issue was first reported by cybersecurity firm Cyberhaven, which fell victim to a phishing attack.

Key Points:

  • The hacking incident potentially exposes user data and passwords.
  • Phishing tactics allowed hackers to gain access to extensions.
  • Users are advised to avoid unknown links and consider using password managers.
  • The incident underscores the importance of security for Chrome extensions.
“The cyberattack on extensions have been organised with the help of phishing.”

Users are urged to be vigilant and protect their accounts in light of this significant security breach.

item.title: Flipkart year-end sale: Grab iPhone 15 for ₹58,999 and iPhone 16 at … All details | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Flipkart Year-End Sale Offers Discounts on iPhones and More

Date: December 2024 Source: Live Mint

As 2024 comes to a close, Flipkart is offering significant discounts on various premium and budget smartphones during its "Mobiles Year-End" sale.

  • The iPhone 15 is now available for ₹58,999, down from ₹79,999 for the green variant, marking a saving of ₹21,000.
  • The iPhone 16 is priced at ₹74,900, with an additional ₹4,000 off for select bank card users.
  • Samsung's Galaxy S24 Plus has a discount bringing its price down to ₹64,999 from ₹99,999.
  • Motorola's Edge 50 Pro is available for ₹27,999, while the Moto G85 is listed at ₹17,999.
  • Other deals include the Nothing Phone (2a) for ₹22,499 and discounts on Vivo T3 Lite and Poco C61.
“This is an opportune moment for tech enthusiasts to grab their desired devices at competitive rates.”

The sale presents a great opportunity for shoppers to take advantage of reduced prices on some of the latest smartphones.

item.title: US News Today highlights on December 31, 2024 : Sunita Williams to celebrate New Year 2025 16 times in space | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Sunita Williams to Celebrate New Year 2025 16 Times in Space

Date: 31 Dec 2024 | Source: LiveMint

Astronaut Sunita Williams and the Expedition 72 crew will uniquely celebrate New Year’s by witnessing 16 sunrises and sunsets in just 24 hours while aboard the International Space Station (ISS).

  • Astronaut Sunita Williams and her crew are prepared to celebrate New Year’s Eve in a distinctive manner from space.
  • The ISS crew will see 16 different sunrises and sunsets during the 24-hour period of New Year's Eve and New Year's Day.
“Witnessing New Year 2025 from orbit is a truly unique experience!” - Sunita Williams

This celebration marks a remarkable event in space exploration and draws attention to human achievements in science and technology.

item.title: Apple Might Introduce 'ProMotion' Technology To iPhone 17 Series' Base Variants - ABP Live
item.description:
Apple Might Introduce 'ProMotion' Technology To iPhone 17 Series' Base Variants

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: 9To5Google

Apple is reportedly planning to introduce its ProMotion display technology across the entire iPhone 17 lineup, potentially bringing higher refresh rates to all models and significantly enhancing user experience.

  • ProMotion currently exclusive to Pro and Pro Max variants with up to 120Hz refresh rates.
  • Base models may feature refresh rates of up to 90Hz, closing the gap with Pro models.
  • This evolution reflects Apple's strategy to incorporate more advanced features into standard models.
  • The iPhone 17 series is expected to maintain distinctions between standard and Pro models, while still offering upgraded features.
“This upgrade for the standard models would still represent a significant improvement, narrowing the performance gap between the tiers.”

In conclusion, Apple is set to enhance the iPhone 17 series with ProMotion technology for base models, signifying a continued trend towards feature convergence across its product line.

item.title: Spotify faces backlash over pornographic content | Tap to know more | Inshorts - Inshorts
item.description:
Spotify faces backlash over pornographic content

Published on: 10:31 am on Tuesday 31 December, 2024 | Source: Inshorts

Spotify has come under fire after users reported explicit pornographic videos appearing in search results for the artist M.I.A., leading to widespread criticism and frustration over the company's response time.

  • Users initially flagged the issue on Reddit, sharing images of inappropriate content found in search results.
  • Although the explicit link has been removed, many Spotify users are unhappy with the delay in Spotify's response to the problem.
Users expressed frustration with Spotify’s delayed response to the issue.

This incident sheds light on the challenges content platforms face in managing user-generated content and ensuring appropriate experiences for their audience.

item.title: Apple TV+ Free Weekend Streaming Event: All you may want to know - The Economic Times
item.description:
Apple TV+ Free Weekend Streaming Event: All You Need to Know

Last Updated: 31 December, 2024 | The Feed

Apple TV+ will allow users to stream its full catalog for free for three days in January 2025. The platform aims to attract new subscribers through this promotional offer.

  • Free streaming from January 3 to 5, 2025, for users with an Apple ID.
  • No paid subscription is required to access content during the free period.
  • The regular subscription cost of Apple TV+ is $9.99 per month or $99.99 per year.
  • Popular titles available include 'Severance,' 'Ted Lasso,' and 'The Morning Show.'
  • Users can stream from various devices by logging in with their Apple ID.
“This initiative aims to encourage new users to subscribe to the service.”

After January 5, a subscription will be required to continue accessing Apple TV+ content.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 price leaked: All you need to know about Apple’s 2025 budget iPhone - The Financial Express
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 Price Leak: All You Need to Know About Apple’s 2025 Budget iPhone

Date: N/A Source: Financial Express

As we look ahead to 2025, Apple fans are buzzing about the anticipated iPhone SE (2025). Recent leaks suggest a price of $499, bringing excitement over whether the device will maintain its affordability.

  • The iPhone SE (2025) is anticipated to feature Apple’s latest A18 chipset, 8GB of RAM, and a 48 MP primary camera.
  • The device is expected to include a 6.06-inch OLED display with a 60Hz refresh rate.
  • A notable upgrade will be Face ID, adopting a design similar to the iPhone 14.
  • Though not equipped with premium features like the iPhone 16, it offers high-end performance at a budget-friendly price.
  • The launch is expected in the first half of 2025.
"The price leak comes just as Apple fans were beginning to wonder whether the SE model would see a significant price bump or if it would remain relatively affordable."

The expected pricing and features of the iPhone SE (2025) make it a compelling choice for budget-conscious consumers seeking advanced technology.

item.title: Poco X7 5G Series Design Teased; Poco X7 Pro to Get MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Poco X7 5G Series Design Teased; Poco X7 Pro Chipset Confirmed

Publication Date: January 2, 2024

Source: Gadgets 360

Poco has revealed the design and specifications of the upcoming Poco X7 5G series in India, which will launch on January 9.

  • The Poco X7 series will include a base model and a Pro variant, both available via Flipkart.
  • The Pro variant will feature a MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset.
  • The designs show distinct camera placements: a centered squircle for the base model and a pill-shaped island for the Pro.
  • Both models are expected to have a 50-megapixel main camera, with the Pro variant getting a Sony IMX882 sensor.
  • Battery capacities are anticipated to be 5,110mAh for the base and 6,000mAh for the Pro, with fast charging capabilities.
“Poco X7 5G series handsets will get IP68-rated builds.”

In conclusion, the Poco X7 5G series promises enhanced design and performance features, targeting tech enthusiasts in India.

item.title: OnePlus Watch 3 Could Offer ECG, 60-Second Checkup Features via OHealth App - Gadgets 360
item.description:
OnePlus Watch 3 Tipped to Debut With New Health Tracking Features

Date: Not available Source: Not available

The OnePlus Watch 3 is rumored to launch alongside the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, featuring advanced health tracking capabilities.

  • New ECG feature to detect health conditions like AFib and heart rate irregularities.
  • Wrist Temperature function requires baseline readings over several days.
  • 60-second Checkup feature to monitor various health metrics.
  • Expected specifications include Snapdragon W5 Gen 1, 2GB RAM, and 32GB storage.
  • Potential Pro variant may be released.
“The paired phone may need specific requirements to use some features, but many can be accessed directly on the watch.”

The OnePlus Watch 3 aims to introduce robust health monitoring tools catering to user well-being.

item.title: iPhone 16, OnePlus 12R and more: Most popular phones of 2024 - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Popular Smartphones of 2024: iPhone 16, OnePlus 12R and More

Publication Date: December 31, 2024 / Source: Moneycontrol

This article reviews the smartphone market of 2024, highlighting key models that emerged across various price ranges, emphasizing the trend towards 5G connectivity.

  • 2024 witnessed a range of smartphone launches catering to a variety of users.

  • Budget smartphones are increasingly competitive with flagships from major brands.
“The modular design language of the CMF Phone 1 makes it stand out among the rival brands.”

item.title: Vivo X200 Ultra Tipped to Get Triple Rear Camera Unit With 200-Megapixel Sensor - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Vivo X200 Ultra Camera Details Tipped; May Get 200-Megapixel Sensor

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Gadgets360

Vivo is reportedly preparing to unveil the X200 Ultra, which could feature a groundbreaking 200-megapixel camera among its triple rear camera setup.

  • The Vivo X200 Ultra may include a 50-megapixel main sensor, a 50-megapixel secondary sensor, and a 200-megapixel camera.
  • All cameras are expected to support 4K video recording at 120fps.
  • The phone may utilize Samsung's ISOCELL HP9 sensor for the periscope camera.
  • Features like a large aperture and anti-shaking capabilities are anticipated for the primary camera.
  • The device is believed to be equipped with Vivo's new generation imaging chip.
The Vivo X200 Ultra aims to enhance mobile photography with high-resolution capabilities and advanced video recording features.

This development, while not officially announced, signifies Vivo's continued focus on high-performance camera technology in its smartphone lineup.

item.title: Best Midrange Smartphones of 2024 in India - Firstpost
item.description:
Best Midrange Smartphones of 2024 in India

Publication Date: December 2024
Source: Firstpost

This article highlights the best midrange smartphones of 2024, focusing on devices that offer solid performance and excellent value for money.

  • Google Pixel 8a

    Starts at Rs 34,999; features a 6.1-inch Full HD+ OLED display, Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chip, and outstanding camera capabilities.

  • Motorola Edge 50 Ultra

    Utilizes Snapdragon 8s Gen 3, boasts a 6.7-inch P-OLED display, and includes versatile triple-camera setup.

  • Realme GT 6 / Xiaomi 14 CIVI

    Both share powerful specs with Snapdragon 8s Gen 3, vibrant AMOLED displays, and dual 50MP cameras.

  • Poco F6 5G

    A budget-friendly option powered by Snapdragon 8s Gen 3, with an AMOLED display, and long battery life.

  • OnePlus Nord 4 5G

    Offers a metal body design, strong performance from Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3, and excellent camera features.

These midrange smartphones are poised to provide impressive capabilities without breaking the bank, making them suitable choices for tech enthusiasts in 2024.

item.title: The Biggest Game Releases Of January 2025 - GameSpot
item.description:
The Biggest Game Releases Of January 2025

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: GameSpot

January 2025 brings a mix of remasters and new entries to various gaming platforms. Highlights include major releases such as Donkey Kong Country Returns HD and Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth.

  • Remasters include Donkey Kong Country Returns and Star Wars: Jedi Power Battles.
  • PC gamers can look forward to Marvel's Spider-Man 2 and Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth.
  • Indie games making their debut include Hyper Light Breaker and Sniper Elite: Resistance.
  • February 2025 is expected to be packed with high-profile games.
“February 2025 will be the big month for new releases, as it's loaded with high-profile games.”

In summary, January 2025 is shaping up to be an exciting month for gamers, although the major releases are slated for February.

item.title: Vivo Said to Launch Mixed Reality Headset in 2025 to Compete With Apple Vision Pro - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Vivo's Upcoming Mixed Reality Headset to Launch Next Year

Publication Date: Tuesday, Source: Gadgets360

Vivo has announced plans to launch a mixed reality (MR) headset next year, aiming to compete with models like the Apple Vision Pro and Samsung's Project Moohan. The first prototype is expected in 2025, with further details to follow.

  • Vivo's mixed reality headset will launch next year.
  • The device is anticipated to compete with the Apple Vision Pro and Samsung's Project Moohan.
  • The first prototype will be available in September 2025.
  • The launch will depend on the readiness of the supporting content ecosystem.
“High-fidelity prototype experiences” will be conducted in several Chinese cities by the end of next year.

The announcement signals Vivo's commitment to entering the mixed reality market, potentially affecting competition significantly.

item.title: Best Flagship-Killer Smartphones of 2024 in India - Firstpost
item.description:
Best Flagship-Killer Smartphones of 2024 in India

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Firstpost

This article showcases the top flagship-killer smartphones of 2024 in India, offering great features at more affordable prices.

  • OnePlus 12: Features Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, excellent display, strong camera setup.
  • Xiaomi 14: Compact design, Leica cameras, impressive battery life.
  • Samsung Galaxy S24 5G: Solid performance, excellent camera, long software support.
  • Realme GT 7 Pro: Powerful processor, robust design, great battery life.
  • Vivo X200 5G: Strong camera features, IP69 rating, durable battery.
“These flagship-killers redefine value without compromising on quality.”

The flagship-killer smartphones of 2024 prove that consumers can enjoy premium features without breaking the bank.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 price leaked ahead of launch: Potential for budget-friendly Apple entry - India TV News
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 Price Leaked Ahead of Launch: Potential for Budget-Friendly Apple Entry

Publication Date: December 31, 2024 Source: India TV News

The wait for the iPhone SE 4 will soon be over, as it's expected to launch in early 2025. This budget-friendly device from Apple is rumored to be unveiled in the first half of the year. Recent leaks have shed light on what to expect from this new model.

  • The iPhone SE 4 is anticipated to incorporate advanced AI features driven by the new A18 Bionic chipset.
  • It may feature a 6.1-inch OLED display and a dual-camera setup for the first time.
  • Expected pricing is around KRW 800,000 (approximately Rs 46,000), with U.S. estimates between $449 and $549.
  • The price hike is attributed to rising component costs, alongside expected 5G support and a 48MP rear camera.
  • Additional features may include eSIM support, LPDDR5X RAM, and a USB Type-C port.
“Market analysts suggest that the price hike for the upcoming iPhone SE 4 could be due to rising component costs.”

Apple has also announced a ban on the sale of three iPhone models, affecting the iPhone 14, iPhone 14 Plus, and iPhone SE (3rd generation) in several European countries.

item.title: Apple TV+ streaming for free first weekend; Top 5 series to watch - Business Standard
item.description:
Apple TV+ Streaming Available for Free This Weekend to Celebrate the New Year

Date: January 3, 2025

Source: Business Standard

Apple has announced that its streaming service, Apple TV+, will be offered for free globally this weekend from January 3 to January 5, 2025. Users need just an Apple ID to access the service without any charges.

  • Free access to Apple TV+ from January 3 to January 5, 2025.
  • No subscription required, but users must have an Apple ID.
  • Current Apple device holders already possess an Apple ID.
  • Top 5 popular shows highlighted for viewers.

Top 5 Popular Shows on Apple TV+

  • Severance: A psychological thriller exploring the separation of work and personal memories.
  • Silo: A dystopian drama set in a giant underground silo in a toxic world, renewed for additional seasons.
  • Ted Lasso: A heartwarming comedy about an American football coach managing a British soccer team.
  • Bad Sisters: A dark comedy-drama about sisterly bonds and secrets following a suspicious death.
  • Shrinking: A comedy series about a grieving therapist who breaks rules to share his honest opinions.

This promotion is an excellent opportunity for viewers to experience Apple TV+ services and discover new shows.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series might see a price hike due to use of Qualcomm chipset - 91mobiles
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Price Hike Due to Qualcomm Chipset

Publication Date: Not specified Source: 91Mobiles

The Samsung Galaxy S25 series is set to debut on January 22nd at the 'Galaxy Unpacked' event, with all models powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset due to low yields of the Exynos 2500, potentially leading to a price increase.

Key Points:

  • Qualcomm charging approximately $190 per Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, impacting overall costs for Galaxy S25.
  • Manufacturing of Snapdragon using TSMC’s 3nm process could lead to further price hikes.
  • Shift from Exynos to Qualcomm is due to insufficient production yields of Samsung's chips.
  • Samsung's previous experience with low yields affected production timelines and strategies.
“Samsung reportedly faced a similar situation previously with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, leading to a shift in production.”

This change in strategy might not only influence pricing for the Galaxy S25 series but may also reflect broader trends in the semiconductor supply chain.

item.title: realme 14x 5G Review: Durable, powerful, consistent - CNBCTV18
item.description:
realme 14x 5G Review: Durable, powerful, consistent

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: CNBC TV18

The realme 14x 5G impresses with its durable design, long-lasting battery, and reliable performance, making it an excellent choice for those seeking value in the mid-range segment.

  • IP69-certified design with military-grade protection.
  • Equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 ensuring smooth performance.
  • Features a robust 6,000 mAh battery for extensive usage.
  • 6.67-inch IPS LCD display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • 50MP primary camera and 8MP front camera with decent image quality.
  • Affordable pricing at ₹14,999.
“The realme 14x 5G is a game-changer in the mid-range smartphone market.”

In conclusion, the realme 14x 5G stands out for its durability and performance at a competitive price, appealing to users who value resilience and battery life over premium features.

item.title: Redmi Turbo 4 Battery, Build Details Revealed Ahead of January 2 Launch - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Redmi Turbo 4 Battery, Build Details Revealed Ahead of January 2 Launch

Date: January 2, 2024   Source: Gadgets 360

The Redmi Turbo 4 is set to launch in China on January 2. It is expected to be powered by MediaTek's new Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset, featuring a powerful battery and impressive water resistance ratings.

  • Powered by a 6,550mAh battery.
  • IP66, IP68, and IP69 ratings for dust and water resistance.
  • Will have a 6.67-inch 1.5K OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Expected to support up to 16GB of RAM and 512GB of storage with Android 15-based HyperOS 2.0.
  • Features a dual rear camera with a 50MP primary sensor and a 20MP front camera.
  • Could support 90W wired fast charging and an in-display fingerprint sensor.
“The handset will arrive in a 'Lucky Cloud White' colour option.”

In conclusion, the Redmi Turbo 4 is shaping up to be a powerful smartphone with exciting features that cater to tech-savvy users.

item.title: Machine learning can help blood tests have a separate ‘normal’ for each patient - The Hindu
item.description:
Machine Learning Tailors Blood Test Norms to Individual Patients

Publication Date: December 31, 2024 | Source: The Conversation

This article discusses recent advancements in using machine learning to personalize blood test readings, moving away from traditional one-size-fits-all reference intervals.

  • Blood tests, particularly complete blood counts (CBC), are commonly used but often lack precision.
  • Current blood test analyses are based on population averages, which neglect individual patient specifics.
  • Research from the University of Washington and Harvard Medical School suggests machine learning can identify more accurate 'normal' ranges for individual patients.
  • Individual normal blood count ranges were found to be significantly narrower than population-based ones.
  • The study analyzed blood tests from over 50,000 patients, showing that personalized interpretations can improve disease diagnosis.
  • Future applications may lead to enhanced personalized medicine strategies that define health based on individual patient history.
“The set points themselves were strong indicators for future risk of developing a disease.”

In conclusion, leveraging machine learning in clinical settings could revolutionize how blood test results are interpreted, enhancing the precision of diagnoses and personalized healthcare.
